definition: the twelve equatorial constellations or signs of the zodiac in Western astronomy and astrology, namely: Aries 白羊[Bai2 yang2], Taurus 金牛[Jin4 niu2], Gemini 雙子|双子[Shuang1 zi3], Cancer 巨蟹[Ju4 xie4], Leo 獅子|狮子[Shi1 zi3], Virgo 室女[Shi4 nu:3], Libra 天秤[Tian1 cheng4], Scorpio 天蠍|天蝎[Tian1 xie1], Sagittarius 人馬|人马[Ren2 ma3], Capricorn 摩羯[Mo2 jie2], Aquarius 寶瓶|宝瓶[Bao3 ping2], Pisces 雙魚|双鱼[Shuang1 yu2]
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
see 十二宮|十二宫[shi2 er4 gong1]

sentences.english: When people speak of their "sign, " they are talking about their Zodiac sign.
sentences.chinese: 當人們提到“星座”，談論的是他們的黃道十二宮。

sentences.english: Taurus is the second sign of the zodiac, representing growth and development.
sentences.chinese: 金牛座是十二宮的第二個星座，代表成長。

sentences.english: People who belong to this sign of zodiac are ambitious with a streak of independence.
sentences.chinese: 處於這一黃道十二宮的人有野心而獨立。

sentences.english: The Chinese zodiac operates on a rotation of 12 different signs, or animals.
sentences.chinese: 中國的黃道十二宮12生肖一輪迴。

sentences.english: In January you will become the zodiac's most favorite child!
sentences.chinese: 一月，你會成爲黃道十二宮的新寵兒。

sentences.english: It is a Pagan adaptation of the cross of the Zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 這是非基督教所改制的黃道十二宮的十字架。

sentences.english: Astrologers also believe that the planets influence the activities or interests associated with individual houses.
sentences.chinese: 行星對地表十二宮也有首要影響。

sentences.english: The zodiac is used in astrology to predict the future.
sentences.chinese: 十二宮圖用於占星術中預測未來。

sentences.english: The fourth sign of the Zodiac, Cancer the Crab is ruled by the restless Moon.
sentences.chinese: 黃道十二宮的第四宮是由月亮統治的巨蟹座。

sentences.english: Large ones are ruled by the 12th.
Astrologers always stress on the compatibility of couples based on their zodiac signs.
sentences.chinese: 占卜師總在情人配對之事上強調黃道十二宮。

sentences.english: I like wolves and think they should be a zodiac animal.
sentences.chinese: 我象狼一樣，認爲他們應該是黃道十二宮的動物。

sentences.english: Libra is the seventh of the zodiac signs.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座是黃道十二宮的第七宮。

sentences.english: Gemini is the third sign of the zodiac, representing quickness of thought.
sentences.chinese: 雙子座是十二宮地第三個星座，代表思維敏捷。

sentences.english: These Houses are known as the 12 signs of the Zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 這十二宮也就是黃道十二星座。

definition: palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
